setup_commands.github: bun run cli/index.ts mcp remote https://api.githubcopilot.com/mcp/ --name github
setup_commands.notion: bun run cli/index.ts mcp remote https://mcp.notion.com/mcp --name notion
setup_commands.linear: bun run cli/index.ts mcp remote https://mcp.linear.app/sse --name linear
setup_commands.jira: bun run cli/index.ts mcp add jira --api-key JIRA_API_TOKEN -- npx -y @anthropic/claude-code-jira-server
